action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1297 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 30.
Amendment SA 1297 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S768; text: CR S771-772) To subpoena John Robert Bolton.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1297 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1297 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 30.
